subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Manu Ginóbili of the San Antonio Spurs will be out for the rest of the season after scans showed his injured right ankle had become worse. Ginóbili missed 19 games after the All-Star break before coming back late last month.
snippet: Manu Ginóbili of the San Antonio Spurs will be out for the rest of the season after scans showed his injured right ankle had become worse. Ginóbili missed 19 games after the All-Star break before coming back late last month.
